info.name: Twitter - Clear out distracting crud
info.description:
Remove the following distracting time-wasters from the Twitter sidebar:

- Who to follow
- Trending Topics
- Following (We can just click the link at the top when we need to)
- Promotions
- That explanatory "Lists are..." message that you've already seen a million times

Result: A refreshingly un-cluttered, functional sidebar that needs no scrolling to view.
info.additionalInfo:
Updates: 
- Following page now un-broken on old Twitter.
- Now also cleans up the new Twitter preview. (Let me know if I missed any bugs)
- Restore "Similar to..." block for profile pages not your own on new Twitter.
- Now also cleans up Twitter's look circa January 2013.
- Now clears out the in-stream "who to follow" box and the "Advertise with Twitter" link in the footer/sidebar.
